attributes.action: Exempt caravan owners from any proposed 4 by 4 tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Personaly I don't like 4 by 4's but caravan owners do need them because they are only vehicles powerful enough to tow heavy caravans. Our old 4 by 2 burned out its clutch towing the van up the hill we live on. Owners of caravans should be exempted from any tax on 4 by 4 cars.
